meanings.definition: The state or quality of having a beard.
meanings.sent1: His beardedness gave him a distinguished look.
meanings.sent2: I admire his beardedness; it suits him well.
meanings.sent3: The beardedness of the old wizard made him look wise and mysterious.
meanings.sent4: In the forest, the beardedness of the trees seemed to whisper ancient secrets.
meanings.sent5: The beardedness of the mountain range was a majestic sight against the sunset.

meanings.definition: The presence of facial hair on a man's chin and cheeks.
meanings.sent1: His beardedness made him look older than he was.
meanings.sent2: The barber trimmed his beardedness neatly.
meanings.sent3: The beardedness of the pirate gave him a rugged appearance.
meanings.sent4: The beardedness of the lion's mane added to its majestic aura.
meanings.sent5: The beardedness of the actor was a key part of his character's look in the movie.

meanings.sent1: His beardedness was a defining feature of his face.
meanings.sent2: The beardedness of the model gave him a unique appeal.
meanings.sent3: The beardedness of the statue made it stand out among the others.
meanings.sent4: The beardedness of the clouds in the sky added a touch of whimsy to the scene.
meanings.sent5: The beardedness of the old painting added an air of sophistication to the room.
